condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: D'ici à la fin de l'épidémie, Les mesures de prévention et de contrôle de l’infection réduisent le risque de transmission nosocomiale et communautaire de la MVE.

description.narrative: In 2019, As a co-led of the Infection Prevention Control/WASH commission, UNICEF provided WASH interventions and reinforced basic WASH services in 2,972 health facilities, which included the provision of water and WASH kits and awareness raising of traditional practitioners. UNICEF also led the hygiene promotion and provision of WASH kits in 2,179 schools. In communities, UNICEF organized mass outreach activities on hygiene promotion reaching 20,748 households and set-up handwashing stations and temperature check points in strategic transit locations. | Status:Met | As-of Date:08/02/2020

title.narrative: Number of community sites (port, market places, local restaurant, churches) with hand washing facilities in the affected areas.
Number of health facilities in affected health zones provided with essential WASH services.
Number of target schools in high risk areas provided with handwashing facilities.
Number of households of confirmed cases, contacts and neighbors of confirmed cases who received a hygiene and prevention kits with adequate messaging.
Percentage of schools and public places near confirmed cases locations where handwashing stations are installed and utilized
Percentage of households, health facilities and public places with reported cases decontaminated within 72 hours.
